actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE sys_role SET
		ID = '{{update_form.fieldState.ID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ID : update_form.sourceData.ID}}',
		NAME = '{{update_form.fieldState.NAME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.NAME : update_form.sourceData.NAME}}',
    DESCRIPTION = '{{update_form.fieldState.DESCRIPTION.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DESCRIPTION : update_form.sourceData.DESCRIPTION}}',
		STATUS = '{{update_form.fieldState.STATUS.isVisible ? update_form.formData.STATUS : update_form.sourceData.STATUS}}',
		TENANT_ID = '{{update_form.fieldState.TENANT_ID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.TENANT_ID : update_form.sourceData.TENANT_ID}}',
		REVISION = '{{update_form.fieldState.REVISION.isVisible ? update_form.formData.REVISION : update_form.sourceData.REVISION}}',
		CREATED_BY = '{{update_form.fieldState.CREATED_BY.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CREATED_BY : update_form.sourceData.CREATED_BY}}',
		CREATED_TIME = '{{update_form.fieldState.CREATED_TIME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CREATED_TIME : update_form.sourceData.CREATED_TIME}}',
		UPDATED_BY = '{{update_form.fieldState.UPDATED_BY.isVisible ? update_form.formData.UPDATED_BY : update_form.sourceData.UPDATED_BY}}',
		UPDATED_TIME = '{{update_form.fieldState.UPDATED_TIME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.UPDATED_TIME : update_form.sourceData.UPDATED_TIME}}'
WHERE ID = {{data_table.selectedRow.ID}};
